00033 void ECoulomb::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00034 
00035     string key = "options.ecoulomb";
00036 
00037     cout << endl << "... ... Init" << flush;    
00038     
00039     _cutoff = options->get(key+".cutoff").as< double >();
00040     _outFile = options->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00041     if (options->exists(key+".first")) {
00042         _first = options->get(key+".first").as< int >();
00043     }
00044     else {
00045         _first = 1;
00046     }
00047     if (options->exists(key+".last")) {
00048         _last = options->get(key+".last").as< int >();
00049     }
00050     else {
00051         _last = -1;
00052     }
00053 }

00055 
00056 bool ECoulomb::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00057 
00058     // Polar sites generated?
00059     if (top->isEStatified() == false) {
00060         cout << endl << "... ... ERROR: Estatify first. Return. " << flush;
00061         return 0;
00062     }
00063     else { 
00064         cout << endl << "... ... System is estatified. Proceed. " << flush;
00065     }
00066 
00067     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00068     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
00069 
00070     // Reset all polar sites to neutral state
00071     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); 
00072          sit < top->Segments().end();
00073          ++sit) {
00074     for (pit = (*sit)->PolarSites().begin();
00075          pit < (*sit)->PolarSites().end();
00076          ++pit) {
00077         (*pit)->Charge(0); 
00078     }}
00079 
00080     // Calculate energies for segments
00081     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00082          sit < top->Segments().end();
00083          ++sit) {
00084 
00085          if ((*sit)->getId() < _first) { continue; }
00086          if ((*sit)->getId() == _last+1)  { break; }
00087 
00088          cout << endl << "... ... Evaluating site " << (*sit)->getId() << flush;
00089 
00090     for (int state = -1; state < 2; ++state) {
00091          
00092          this->EvaluateSegment(top, *sit, state);                 
00093     }}
00094 
00095     // Output results
00096     this->Output2File(top);
00097 
00098     return true;
00099 }

00102 void ECoulomb::EvaluateSegment(Topology *top, Segment *seg, int state) {    
00103 
00104     if (seg->hasChrgState(state)) {        
00105 
00106         vector< Segment*   > ::iterator ext;
00107         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
00108         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
00109 
00110         // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00111         // Charge segment appropriately //
00112         // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00113 
00114         for (pit1 = seg->PolarSites().begin();
00115              pit1 < seg->PolarSites().end();
00116              ++pit1) {
00117 
00118              (*pit1)->Charge(state);
00119         }
00120 
00121         double E_INTER   = 0.0;
00122         int    COUNT_EXT = 0;
00123         double INT2eV    = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12)
00124                          * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
00125 
00126         // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00127         // Calculate interaction energy //
00128         // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00129 
00130         FILE *out;
00131         string sphpdb = boost::lexical_cast<string>(seg->getId())
00132                       + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(state)
00133                       + "_check.pdb";
00134         out = fopen(sphpdb.c_str(), "w");
00135         vec com_shift = -1 * seg->getPos();
00136         for (pit1 = seg->PolarSites().begin();
00137              pit1 < seg->PolarSites().end();
00138              ++pit1) {
00139              (*pit1)->PrintPDB(out, com_shift);
00140         }
00141 
00142         for (ext = top->Segments().begin();
00143              ext < top->Segments().end();
00144              ++ext) {
00145 
00146              // Segment different from central one?
00147              if ((*ext)->getId() == seg->getId()) { continue; }             
00148              
00149              // Segment within cutoff?
00150              double r12 = abs(top->PbShortestConnect((*ext)->getPos(),
00151                                                        seg->getPos()));
00152              if (r12 > _cutoff) { continue; }
00153 
00154              // Check polar sites
00155              // (*ext)->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "Charges");
00156 
00157              ++COUNT_EXT;
00158 
00159              for (pit1 = (*ext)->PolarSites().begin();
00160                   pit1 < (*ext)->PolarSites().end();
00161                   ++pit1) {
00162 
00163                   vec dr_pbc = top->PbShortestConnect((*pit1)->getPos(),
00164                                                         seg->getPos());
00165                   vec dr_dir = seg->getPos() - (*pit1)->getPos();
00166                   vec pol_shift = vec(0,0,0);
00167                   if (abs(dr_pbc - dr_dir) > 1e-8) {
00168                       pol_shift = dr_dir - dr_pbc;
00169                   }
00170                   (*pit1)->PrintPDB(out, com_shift + pol_shift);
00171 
00172              for (pit2 = seg->PolarSites().begin();
00173                   pit2 < seg->PolarSites().end();
00174                   ++pit2) {
00175 
00176                   double R = abs(top->PbShortestConnect((*pit1)->getPos(),
00177                                                         (*pit2)->getPos()));
00178 
00179                   E_INTER += (*pit1)->Q00 * 1/R * (*pit2)->Q00;
00180              }}
00181         }
00182 
00183         fclose(out);
00184 
00185         // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00186         // Store result, reset to neutral //
00187         // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00188 
00189         seg->setEMpoles(state, INT2eV * E_INTER);
00190         _log_seg_sphere[seg->getId()] = COUNT_EXT;
00191         cout << endl << "... ... ... STATE " << state << ": "
00192              << " EP(~) = " << E_INTER*INT2eV << " eV"
00193              << " SPH(o) = " << COUNT_EXT+1 << flush;
00194 
00195         for (pit1 = seg->PolarSites().begin();
00196              pit1 < seg->PolarSites().end();
00197              ++pit1) {
00198              (*pit1)->Charge(0);
00199         }
00200     }
00201 }

00203 
00204 void ECoulomb::Output2File(Topology *top) {
00205 
00206     FILE *out;
00207     string topOutFile = "Frame"
00208                       + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00209                       + "_" + _outFile;
00210     out = fopen(topOutFile.c_str(), "w");
00211 
00212     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00213     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00214          sit < top->Segments().end();
00215          ++sit) {
00216 
00217          if ((*sit)->getId() < _first) { continue; }
00218          else if ((*sit)->getId() == _last+1)  { break; }
00219 
00220         fprintf(out, "%4d ", (*sit)->getId() );
00221         fprintf(out, "%4s ", (*sit)->getName().c_str() );
00222 
00223         // Energies
00224         if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
00225             fprintf(out, "   0 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(0) );
00226         }
00227         if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
00228             fprintf(out, "  -1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(-1) );
00229         }
00230 
00231         if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
00232             fprintf(out, "  +1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(+1) );
00233         }
00234 
00235         // Iterations
00236         if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
00237             fprintf(out, "   0 0     ");
00238         }
00239         if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
00240             fprintf(out, "  -1 0     ");
00241         }
00242 
00243         if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
00244             fprintf(out, "  +1 0     ");
00245         }
00246 
00247         // Polarizable sphere
00248         fprintf(out, "   EXT %4d   ",
00249                 _log_seg_sphere[(*sit)->getId()]);
00250 
00251         fprintf(out, "   %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f   ",
00252                 (*sit)->getPos().getX(),
00253                 (*sit)->getPos().getY(),
00254                 (*sit)->getPos().getZ());
00255 
00256         fprintf(out, " \n");
00257     }
00258 }
